"
Phonetic alphabet.

" " | A - ALPHA | N - NOVEMBER| 

" " | B - BRAVO | O - OSCAR | 

" " | C - CHARLE | P - PAPA | 

" " | D - DELTA | Q - QUEBEC | 

" " | E - ECHO | R - ROMEO | 

" " | F - FOXTROT | S - SIERRA | 

" " | G - GOLF | T - TANGO | 

" " | H - HOTEL | U - UNIFORM | 

" " | I - INDIA | V - VICTOR | 

" " | J - JULIET | W - WHISKEY | 

" " | K - KILO | X - X-RAY | 

" " | L - LIMA | Y - YANKEE | 

" " | M - MIKE | Z - ZULU |
